info.description: One API to Rule Them All

property_Connection_categories.description: The Integration categories that this connection supports

property_Connection_auth_other_auth_info.description: When integration.auth_type = "other", this field contains the authentication credentials in the same order as token_names

property_Connection_auth.description: An authentication object that represents a specific authorized user's connection to an integration.

Connection.description: A connection represents a specific authentication of an integration.

property_Integration_categories.description: The categories of support solutions that this integration has

property_Integration_token_instructions.description: instructions for the user on how to find the token/key

property_Webhook_runs.description: An array of the most revent virtual webhook runs

Webhook.description: A webhook is used to POST new/updated information to your server.

property_MessagingMessage_channel_ids.description: Represents the IDs of all channels to which the message is sent. Identifies the channels where the message is posted.

CrmDeal.description: A deal represents an opportunity with companies and/or contacts

property_CrmContact_emails.description: An array of email addresses for this contact

property_CrmContact_telephones.description: An array of telephones for this contact

property_CrmContact_deal_ids.description: An array of deal IDs associated with this contact

property_CrmContact_company_ids.description: An array of company IDs associated with this contact

property_CrmContact_link_urls.description: Additional URLs associated with the contact e.g., LinkedIn, website, etc

CrmContact.description: A contact represents a person that optionally is associated with a deal and/or a company

property_CrmCompany_deal_ids.description: An array of deal IDs associated with this contact

property_CrmCompany_contact_ids.description: An array of contact IDs associated with this company

property_CrmCompany_link_urls.description: Additional URLs associated with the contact e.g., LinkedIn, website, etc

CrmCompany.description: A company represents an organization that optionally is associated with a deal and/or contacts

property_CrmEvent_note.description: The note object, when type = note

property_CrmEvent_meeting.description: The meeting object, when type = meeting

property_CrmEvent_email_cc.description: The event email's cc name & email (name <test@test.com>)

property_CrmEvent_email.description: The email object, when type = email

property_CrmEvent_call.description: The call object, when type = call

property_CrmEvent_task.description: The task object, when type = task

property_CrmEvent_marketing_email_cc.description: The event email's cc name & email (name <test@test.com>)

property_CrmEvent_deal_ids.description: An array of deal IDs associated with this event

property_CrmEvent_company_ids.description: An array of company IDs associated with this event

property_CrmEvent_contact_ids.description: An array of contact IDs associated with this event

CrmEvent.description: An event represents an event, activity, or engagement and is always associated with a deal, contact, or company

property_MarketingList_raw.description: The raw data returned by the integration for this list

property_MarketingMember_emails.description: An array of email addresses for this member

property_MarketingMember_list_ids.description: An array of list IDs associated with this member

property_MarketingMember_tags.description: An array of tags associated with this member

property_MarketingMember_raw.description: The raw data returned by the integration for this member

property_EnrichPerson_emails.description: An array of email addresses for this person

property_EnrichPerson_telephones.description: An array of telephones for this person

property_EnrichPerson_raw.description: The raw data returned by the integration for this person

EnrichPerson.description: A person object from an enrichment integration

property_EnrichCompany_telephones.description: An array of telephones for this company

property_EnrichCompany_raw.description: The raw data returned by the integration for this company

EnrichCompany.description: A company object from an enrichment integration

property_UcContact_emails.description: An array of email addresses for this contact

property_UcContact_telephones.description: An array of telephones for this contact

UcContact.description: A contact represents a person that optionally is associated with a call

property_AtsActivity_user_ids.description: id values of the recruiters associated with the activity.

property_AtsCandidate_link_urls.description: URLs for web pages containing additional material about the candidate (LinkedIn, other social media, articles, etc.)

property_AtsJob_public_job_urls.description: URLs for pages containing public listings for the job

property_AtsJob_groups.description: The departments/divisions/teams that this job belongs to

property_HrisEmployee_groups.description: Which groups/teams/units that this employee/user belongs to.  May not have all of the Group fields present, but should have id, name, or email.

property_VerificationPackage_parameters.description: Questions that need to be answered for this verification

property_CommerceItem_variants.description: first variant is the default variant

property_TaskTask_attachment_ids.description: Array of attachment IDs retrieved from StorageFile.Get endpoint

property_CalendarEventRecurrence_on_days.description: days of the week to repeat on, defaults to undefined (every day), only used if frequency is WEEKLY

property_CalendarEventRecurrence_on_mont.description: months of the year to repeat on, defaults to undefined (every month), only used if frequency is YEARLY, January is 1
days of the month to repeat on, defaults to undefined (every day), only used if frequency is MONTHLY

property_CalendarEventRecurrence_on_week.description: week ordinals for BYDAY (e.g., -1 for last, -2 for second-to-last, 1 for first, 2 for second), only used with on_days. 0 is used for days without week ordinals.

property_CalendarEventRecurrence_on_year.description: days of the year to repeat on, defaults to undefined (every day), only used if frequency is YEARLY

property_CalendarEventRecurrence_exclude.description: dates to exclude from the recurrence, defaults to undefined (no exclusions)

property_RepoOrganization_user_ids.description: id values of the users/employees associated with this organization

parameters.name: success_redirect
parameters.description: The URL where you want the user to be redirect to after a successful authorization.  The connection ID will be appended with (id=<connectionId>) to this URL, as will the state that was provided.

parameters.name: failure_redirect
parameters.description: The URL where you want the user to be redirect to after an unsuccessful authentication. An "error" variable will be appended.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Extra state to send back to your success URL

parameters.name: external_xref
parameters.description: Your user identifier to associate with the new Integration

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language: en, fr, es, it, pt, zh, hi

get.description: Returns an authorization URL for the specified integration.  Once a successful authorization occurs, a new connection is created.

parameters.name: success_redirect
parameters.description: The URL where you want the user to be redirect to after a successful authentication/sign-in.  A "jwt" parameter will be appended to the URL which will contain a name and email of the user who just signed-in.

parameters.name: failure_redirect
parameters.description: The URL where you want the user to be redirect to after an unsuccessful authentication. An "error" variable will be appended.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Extra state to send back to your success URL

get.description: Returns an authentication URL for the specified integration.  Once a successful authentication occurs, the name and email are returned inside a jwt parameter, which is a JSON web token that is base-64 encoded.
